# Attuale Posizione Lavorativa
```{r}
education %>% 
  filter(grepl("oggi", Year)) %>% # This ensures to always select present occupations
    detailed_entries(
    what = Institution,
    when = Year,
    with = Degree,
    where = Where,
    why = detail
  )
```


# Educazione

